sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Add/update an entry in the Armis Device Table for this device
Report successful match and close
break up the MAC responses into individual device strings
What's the original?
For the closing report, we want to know if we got a match or not.

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Need to close all of the operation records.
iterate through each device returned from the REST query

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: in:devices macAddress:(mac1,mac2,...,mac50)
Report unsuccessful match

sys_variable_value.value: MAC did not match an Armis device.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Ignore the record we are told to get, we want to process up to 50 MACs at once.
